channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The U.S. Supreme Court could throw a wrench into Trump’s plan to take Greenland as soon as Tuesday
item.description: If the court rules that the president does not have "emergency" powers to regulate routine international trade then his latest threats on Greenland wo...

item.title: Americans' paychecks grow stronger as Main Street shows new economic strength
item.description: New economic data reveals Main Street strength as Americans see higher pay, while retail sales rose 3.3% and home purchases increased amid lower mortg...

item.title: Construction Autonomy Powers Ahead at CES 2026

item.title: The curious case of the ICE pastor as Minnesota protesters disrupt church services and DOJ launches investigation
item.description: "To have someone serving as a pastor who oversees these ICE agents, is almost unfathomable to me,” said Nekima Levy Armstrong, a reverend herself.

item.title: PwC’s global chairman says most leaders have forgotten ‘the basics’ as 56% are still getting ‘nothing’ out of AI adoption
item.description: PwC's Mohamed Kande talked to Fortune about the "tri-modal mandate" for leaders to execute, transform and build: "I've not seen that in 25 years."

item.title: Trump’s Gaza ‘Board of Peace’ extends invitations to Russia, Belarus and Thailand along with EU
item.description: It's unclear how many leaders have been invited to join the board.

item.title: Trump says he wants Greenland because he was rejected for a Nobel Peace Prize last year
item.description: The president revealed his motivation in a text message to Norway's Prime Minister, who has no say over Nobel awards.

item.title: 13K pounds of ready-to-eat grilled chicken breasts recalled over possible listeria contamination
item.description: More than 13,000 pounds of grilled chicken breasts distributed to seven states were recalled over concerns they may be contaminated with listeria.

item.title: Humanoid Robots Building Airplanes: Airbus Buys 6-Figure Robots From UBTech
item.description: Robots will be building airplanes soon, if a new deal between Airbus and UBTech Robotics is any indicator ...

item.title: WhatsApp Is Finally About To Launch A Long-Anticipated New Feature

item.title: Airlines have 580 million reasons to like GLP-1 weight-loss drugs, analysis finds
item.description: U.S. airline companies stand to save hundreds of millions each year from Americans losing weight thanks to GLP-1 drugs, according to a new study.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
